data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Warmińsko-Mazurskie.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Warmińsko-Mazurskie, Poland

data.prayer: Over 10.51 percent of the people of Warmińsko-Mazurskie are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Warmińsko-Mazurskie to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Warmińsko-Mazurskie, Poland.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jew, Karaite people.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,427,100 people living in the state of Warmińsko-Mazurskie.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Warmińsko-Mazurskie, Poland to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary:
the state of Warmińsko-Mazurskie, Poland has a population of 1,427,100.

We estimate Warmińsko-Mazurskie has 4,428 people who might know Jesus, 1,272,729 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 149,943 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 322 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 4,428 believers in the state of Warmińsko-Mazurskie to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
